mapper.select: select count(*) from mp_post p, mp_userpost up , mp_staff s where p.id = up.POST_ID and s.user_id = up.USER_ID and up.USER_ID = s.user_id and s.STAFF_SCOPE = '1' and p.id in (select id from mp_post where JOB_LEVEL_ID1 = #{id} or JOB_LEVEL_ID2 = #{id})
select id,job_level_code AS code,job_level_name AS name from mp_job_level where group_id = #{groupId}
SELECT count(*) from mp_job_level where ( JOB_LEVEL_NAME = #{jobLevelName} AND JOB_LEVEL_CODE != #{jobLevelCode} ) OR ( JOB_LEVEL_NAME != #{jobLevelName} AND JOB_LEVEL_CODE = #{jobLevelCode} )
SELECT count(*) from mp_job_level where (#{id} is null or id != #{id}) and job_level_code = #{jobLevelCode}
SELECT count(*) from mp_Job_Level where (#{id} is null or id != #{id}) and job_level_name = #{jobLevelName}
